quotes.quote: My momma always said, ''life was like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get''.
quotes.author: Forrest, Forrest Gump

quotes.quote: Sometimes it's the very people who no one imagines anything of who do the things no one can imagine.
quotes.author: Christopher Morcom, The Imitation Game

quotes.quote: When life gets you down do you wanna know what you've gotta do? Just keep swimming!
quotes.author: Dory, Finding Nemo

quotes.quote: I don't want to survive. I want to live.
quotes.author: The Captain, Wall-E

quotes.quote: You're never too old to be young.
quotes.author: Snow White, Snow White

quotes.quote: Some people are worth melting for.
quotes.author: Olaf, Frozen

quotes.quote: Do not be fooled by its commonplace appearance. Like so many things, it is not what outside, but what is inside that counts.
quotes.author: Aladdin, Aladdin

quotes.quote: Always let your conscience be your guide!
quotes.author: The Blue Fairy, Pinocchio

quotes.quote: Do, or do not. There is no try
quotes.author: Yoda, Star Wars: Episode V

quotes.quote: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to us.
quotes.author: Gandalf, Lord of the Rings
